title: Frontend developer
description:
OM OSS
  
Scanreco AB är en framstående och växande aktör inom elektronikbranschen, rotad i svensk ingenjörstradition och innovationskraft. Vi är idag världsledande inom utveckling, tillverkning och marknadsföring av trådlösa styrsystem för kranar och maskiner med strävan om att göra avancerad teknologi till en naturlig förlängning av människan.
  
Sedan 1984 har Scanreco levererat professionella styrsystem för kranar och maskiner inom ett brett spektrum av branscher. Vår ständiga produktutveckling och nära samarbete med kunder och partners, tillsammans med vårt fokus på teknologisk innovation och intuitiv design, har gjort oss till huvudleverantör för ledande företag som Fassi, Schwing, Palfinger, Hiab, Demag och Hammar Maskin.
  
Vi är ett välmående privatägt företag med en omsättning på över 1 miljard SEK. Med en tydlig vision om att expandera vår globala närvaro har vi kontor och distributörer över hela världen, inklusive USA, Tyskland, Italien, Kanada och Polen. Vårt huvudkontor är beläget i en arkitektritad byggnad i Sätra i södra Stockholm.
  
Scanreco värnar om sina anställdas välbefinnande och utveckling genom att skapa en inkluderande arbetsmiljö där varje individ kan växa. Vi investerar i kontinuerlig utbildning och kompetensutveckling för att säkerställa framgång.
  
Med över en halv miljon installerade Scanreco-system fortsätter vi att bevisa vår pålitlighet och hållbarhet genom att erbjuda högkvalitativa och väldesignade styrenheter och mottagare som lever upp till våra kunders förväntningar, även långt in i framtiden.
  
ROLLEN
  
Som frontendutvecklare hos oss får du en central roll i utvecklingen av vår Digital Toolbox, vilket avser en kundportal med tillhörande produktkonfigurator (CPQ) och program för produktinställningar (Modulate) med närmare 1000 användare. Du kommer att arbeta med både nyutveckling och vidareutveckling av vår programvara, vilket innebär en spännande blandning av förvaltning och greenfield-projekt. I nära samarbete med vårt dedikerade utvecklingsteam kommer du att skapa intuitiva och robusta användargränssnitt som gör skillnad för våra interna och externa kunder.
  
Initialt kommer du att få en introduktion och stöttning av seniora kollegor i teamet. På lång sikt förväntas du bli självgående och bidra till utvecklingen av vår Toolbox, inklusive stöd för äldre och kommande produkter.
  
TEAMET
  
Du kommer att jobba inom avdelningen Product Management som består av produktägare, produktspecialister samt seniora front- och backendutvecklare. Med andra ord kommer du att ingå i ett sammanhang med bred kompetens. Vi arbetar iterativt med deploy 2-4 gånger per år samt samarbetar med andra avdelningar kring UAT-testning.
  
Vi är ett ”stort-litet företag” med öppen kommunikation och en vänlig, supporterande atmosfär. Då vi har det mesta inhouse får du direkt feedback på det du utvecklar.
  
KVALIFIKATIONER
  
Vi tror att programmering är ett hantverk som kan tillämpas över olika programmeringsspråk och plattformar. De program som rör denna tjänst är uppdelade i Portal (NodeJS, NextJS, Vue, Vuex) och Modulate (Electron, NodeJS, Vue, Vuex). Vi ser kunskaper inom andra områden som en fördel, inte en förutsättning. Vi förväntar oss att rätt kandidat har ett stort teknikintresse och lär sig snabbt.

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
*Vill du göra samhällsnytta och bidra till Sveriges oberoende i världen? Just nu söker vi en systemutvecklare till vårt team i Stockholm som vill vara med och utveckla framtidens access- och inhämtningssystem. För rätt person kan vi erbjuda ett varierande arbete i en kunskapsintensiv och komplex verksamhet. På FRA arbetar vi med unika uppgifter – för Sveriges säkerhet och integritet.*

**Om FRA**  

Omvärlden är FRA:s arena. Vår uppgift som underrättelsetjänst är att skydda Sverige mot de allvarligaste hot som kan riktas mot ett samhälle – militära angrepp, terrorism och cyberattacker. Vi skyddar det viktigaste vi har – vår trygghet, vår demokrati och vårt sätt att leva. Genom vår kunskap om omvärlden kan vårt land förbereda sig och möta hoten i tid. Vi är experter på cyberområdet och signalspaning och en larmklocka för militära hot. Vi är också kärnan av det svenska cyberförsvaret och skyddar de viktigaste verksamheterna och den viktigaste infrastrukturen från angrepp. För att klara våra kärnuppdrag krävs avancerade tekniklösningar. Tillsammans har vi en unik uppgift, som vi löser med hjälp av vår kunskap och kompetens.


För din trygghet. För vår demokrati. Varje dag. Året om.

**Ditt uppdrag**  

I denna roll hör du till avdelningen för Signalunderrättelser. Som systemutvecklare får du kombinera dina tekniska kunskaper med omvärldsintresse för att bidra till unika underrättelser till våra uppdragsgivare.


Vårt team består av fem medarbetare och vi jobbar agilt enligt Scrum. Vi har ett nära samarbete inom teamet och uppmuntrar kreativitet och nytänkande. Hos oss är du delaktig från första idén till driftsättning. Vi arbetar nära både användare och driftteam.


Resor i och utanför Sverige kan förekomma.


På FRA har vi en stark sekretess och det är viktigt att du är bekväm med att hantera det.

**Du kan**  

Vi söker dig som har/är:

* Utbildad civilingenjör, högskoleingenjör eller systemvetare, alternativt erhållit motsvarande kunskaper genom arbetslivserfarenhet.
* Arbetat med objektorienterad systemutveckling inom Java och/eller C#.
* Erfarenhet av Linux.
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.


Det är meriterande om du också har erfarenhet inom några av följande områden:

* Javascript, Rust, Go, C, C++
* Databas (exempelvis PostgreSQL, mySQL)
* GUI-ramverk (exempelvis Svelte, React)
* DevOpsverktyg, t.ex. Git, Ansible, Jira
* Nätverk (switchar, routrar, protokoll)
* Telekommunikation


Vi kommer att tillämpa arbetsprov som en del av vår utvärdering.

**Du är**  

Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och söker dig som har ett stort intresse för utveckling och drivs av teknisk problemlösning. Vi ser positivt på en god kreativ förmåga och ser att du bidrar med nya idéer för att nå uppsatta mål. Du har en god analytisk förmåga där du kan se samband och behov i verksamheten. Hos oss arbetar du nära verksamheten och vi ser att du verkar för samarbete genom att främja andras idéer och bidra med din kunskap.

**Vårt erbjudande**  

På FRA är varje arbetsuppgift en del av något större. På ett eller annat sätt får du som medarbetare vara med och bidra till att skydda Sveriges integritet och oberoende i världen. Du är med och gör skillnad på riktigt, varje dag.


Våra medarbetare har hög kompetens, men vi kan alltid bli bättre. Därför är professionell utveckling en självklarhet för oss. Vi erbjuder möjligheter till kompetensutveckling. Som nyanställd får du bredda din kompetens direkt med en omfattande introduktionsutbildning som ger dig en större förståelse för uppdraget och hjälper dig in i verksamheten. Som medarbetare får du också möjlighet att hitta rätt utbildningar inom ditt specialområde för att bli ännu bättre på det du brinner för.


Vi värdesätter god hälsa hos våra medarbetare och erbjuder bland annat friskvård under arbetstid. Andra förmåner som vi erbjuder är exempelvis gym på arbetsplatsen och ledarledda aktiviteter, gratis parkering, möjlighet till ledighet på klämdagar, utökad föräldrapenning samt natursköna omgivningar.


Hos oss blir du en av de bästa. På ditt sätt.

**Mer information**  

Arbetsplatsen är belägen i närheten av Drottningholm, ca 10 min med buss från Brommaplan. Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav då anställning vid FRA innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Ett krav för att få anställning är godkänd säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll. Säkerhetsprövningen kommer att genomföras i enlighet med bestämmelser i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning. För mer information är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig teamledare på telefon 010-557 53 33. Fackliga företrädare nås på 010-557 46 00.


Vi tar emot ansökningar via www.fra.se **senast 2025-03-16**

title: Senior systemutvecklare till Vklass
description:
Vklass är en ledande aktör inom Edtech och en av Sveriges största lärplattformar. Vi brinner för att förenkla och förbättra lärandet i våra skolor. Nu söker vi en **Senior Systemutvecklare** som vill vara en del av vårt team och bidra till utvecklingen av vår plattform.

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**

  

* Designa, utveckla och implementera nya funktioner i vår webbaserade plattform.
* Arbeta med modern systemarkitektur och säkerställa hög kvalitet och prestanda.
* Delta aktivt i tekniska diskussioner och påverka val av teknologier och ramverk.
* Samarbeta med produktägare och andra utvecklare för att skapa användarvänliga lösningar.
* Underhålla och förbättra befintlig kodbas samt säkerställa skalbarhet och säkerhet.

**Vi erbjuder**

  

* Ett nära samarbete med ett engagerat och kompetent gäng där samhörighet och arbetsglädje driver vår framgång.
* En dynamisk och innovativ arbetsmiljö.
* Möjlighet att påverka tekniska beslut och arbeta med den senaste teknologin.
* Valfrihet att själv välja dina arbetsverktyg.
* Möjlighet till balans mellan arbete och familj, samt flexibilitet i dina uppgifter och arbetstider.
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och kollektivavtal och bra förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag på 5000 kr.

Stora möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärtillväxt.  
* 

Gör skillnad från dag 1: Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka såväl företaget som din egen utveckling. Vi vill se dig äga din roll, och ger dig således frihet under ansvar för att nå de mål som vi har kommit överens om.  

Vi investerar i din framtid: När du börjar på Vklass öppnar du dörren till oändliga möjligheter. Du kommer att mötas av engagerade ledare som bryr sig om och stöttar dig, och hjälper dig utvecklas både inom ditt specialistområde men även genom nätverk och andra kompetenshöjande aktiviteter.  

Framför allt är vi ett team: Teamkänsla är det som får oss att kunna hålla våra löften och leverera på en hög nivå, men också det som gör att vi kan främja en hållbar företagskultur där vi stöttar och bryr oss om varandra.

 **Din profil**

  

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling.
* Stark kompetens inom **C#, .NET, SQL** och **JavaScript.**
* Erfarenhet av **molnbaserade lösningar** (Azure).
* Kunskap om DevOps-principer och continous delivery.
* Vana att arbeta i **agila utvecklingsmetoder**.
* Ett analytiskt tankesätt och en förmåga att lösa komplexa problem.
* Förmåga att kommunicera väl och samarbeta i team.

**Du som person**  

Du är nyfiken på att lära nytt och har ett genuint intresse för programmering och gärna produktutveckling. Det är viktigt att du är prestigelös, hjälpsam och tar egna initiativ.  

Ditt intresse för jobbet och egna drivkraft är mycket viktig för oss! Vklass är ett entreprenörsdrivet bolag så du är naturligt aktiv i flera delar av vår verksamhet.

**Om Vklass**  

Vklass är ett entreprenörsdrivet **EdTech bolag** som levererar en SaaS tjänst i form av en skolplattform till ett stort antal kommuner i Sverige. Drivkraften för Vklass har alltid varit att genom digitala verktyg underlätta för skolor och lärare för att ge mer tid till lärande i skolan. Vklass har över fem miljoner sidvisningar per dag och är en av de mest besökta webbplatserna i Sverige.  

Vklass är ett bolag inom Visma-koncernen. Vi är idag 18 medarbetare och växer kontinuerligt. Vi drar fördelarna av att vara ett mindre, entreprenöriellt bolag med ett nära samarbete och en varm familjär kultur, samtidigt som har styrkan som ett stort bolag genom att vi ingår i Visma, en av Europas ledande IT-koncerner.

**Ansökan**  

Låter detta som en roll för dig? Skicka in din ansökan med CV och personligt brev via länken senast 16 mars.


Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta vår rekryteringsansvariga: **Stefan Wargh**  

  

Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!


  
Department
Software Development
Role
Senior Software Developer
Locations
Stockholm
Remote status
Hybrid
Application deadline
16 March, 2025
Competencies
SQL, JavaScript, .NET, C#

title: Senior Frontend Developer till marknadsledande tech-bolag
description:
*Har du en gedigen Frontend-bakgrund och trivs i en omväxlande och spännande tech-miljö? Är högteknologisk produktutveckling och långsiktiga lösningar någonting du brinner för?*

*Då kanske du är precis den vi på Visma Enterprise söker!*

 **Om rollen**


Vi söker nu dig som är en senior frontend-utvecklare med djupgående erfarenhet av React och TypeScript för vidareutveckling av vårt marknadsledande lönesystem Agda PS. I denna roll kommer du ha en nyckelroll i utvecklingen av vår användarvänliga webbapplikation, med huvudfokus på prestanda, skalbarhet, och en enastående användarupplevelse.  



  

**Ansvarsområde**

* Designa och utveckla frontend-komponenter med hjälp av React och TypeScript.
* Samarbeta med UX/UI-designers för att säkerställa enastående visuella och funktionella upplevelser.
* Implementera kod enligt bästa praxis, inklusive kodgranskning och enhetstestning.
* Identifiera och implementera förbättringar i vår befintliga kodbas för att öka effektivitet och skalbarhet.
* Delta aktivt i ett agilt utvecklingsteam kring sprintplanering, dagliga stand-ups och retrospektiv.
* Fungera som mentor för juniora utvecklare och främja en kultur av kontinuerligt lärande.

 **Kvalifikationer**

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av frontend-utveckling, med en stark expertis inom React och TypeScript.
* Erfarenhet av modern webbutveckling och relevanta ekosystem som Turborepo och Vite.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling av Progressive Web Applications.
* Förmåga att skriva ren, effektiv och underhållbar kod.
* Erfarenhet av testdriven utveckling (TDD) och verktyg som Vitest och React Testing Library.
* Goda kunskaper i att arbeta med RESTful API:er.
* Utomordentliga kommunikations- och problemlösningsförmågor.
* Meriterande med kunskaper i C# och backend-utveckling.

 **Vad erbjuder vi?**


Visma Enterprise AB kännetecknas av stark framåtanda, prestigelöshet och entreprenörskap. I enlighet med dessa värdeord erbjuder vi dig en miljö där du får chans att briljera med dina kunskaper, utvecklas och göra karriär. Vi växer så det knakar och vill därför mer inget mer än att du ska trivas på ditt jobb och att du blir en bestående del av vår ständigt växande familj. Vidare erbjuder vi som arbetsgivare en mängd förmåner, konkurrenskraftiga villkor och sex veckors semester.


Du söker tjänsten via länken. Vi kommer att påbörja urval och kalla till intervjuer löpande under processen, skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt, dock senast den 28 mars 2025.  

  

  

  

  

**Har du frågor eller önskar mer information om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta:**

Ulrika Malmberg, Product and Development Manager • P&D Agda PS
  

ulrika.malmberg@visma.com
  

+46703950171  

  

Johannes Leander, Frontend Architect • P&D Agda PS  

johannes.leander@visma.com

title: Java developer
description:
The Development Sales team is part of the Technology organization at Tre. Our main task is to develop the systems used in sales to end customers—everything from store solutions to the sales engine for our online shops.
  
  

About the role
  
  

As a Java developer, you are responsible for developing existing applications and support systems. We code in the latest Java version and use REST for APIs. Other tools and technologies present are Docker, Kubernetes, Git, Jenkins, Spring, and GraphQL. We have a learning and development-focused environment emphasizing knowledge sharing and continuous development. With us, you will have great opportunities to contribute knowledge and insights!
  
  

You will look forward to
  
  

work in an agile team where we learn together, as a team and as individuals, to navigate a business in constant change
  
working at a company that delivers critical infrastructure where your contribution directly contributes to societal benefit and ensures that important functions run smoothly
  
be included in one of Sweden's best workplaces according to Great place to work
  
belong to an employer that wants to contribute to women wanting to choose and stay in the technology industry; we are proud partners of Women in Tech and Tjejer Kodar
  
  

About you
  
  

To thrive in the role, we are looking for you who are committed and take the initiative to find your ways and processes to work more efficiently. You solve problems by rethinking and taking input from others.
  
  

You need to have several years of experience in Java, both older and the latest versions, and in developing in JavaScript. Furthermore, you must have knowledge of SOAP/REST and web technologies like HTML, CSS, and jQuery.
  
  

Work with great people
  
Julia Maxén
  
Team Manager
  
"I want my team to have the best conditions to excel in their roles. By empowering each member to perform at their best, we not only grow stronger as a team but also drive Tre forward to new heights"
  
Henrik Sundvall
  
Digital Project Lead
  
"The absolute best thing about being a project manager at Tre is that I get to work broadly with colleagues from all parts of the organization and learn new things every day. I have the freedom to be myself – and be appreciated for it!"
  
Jayasri Battola
  
Developer
  
"The great work culture and the technology made me choose Tre. Working alongside great people in mixed team setups, with both experienced and new talents, along with the latest and greatest tools and technologies like Cloud and Azure."
  
  

Welcome with your application!
  
  

We are accepting applications via this job ad, and interviews are ongoing. A personal letter is not required, but we would like you to answer the questions we ask in connection with your application. We use tests to ensure objective assessments in the selection of candidates. The position may be filled before the application deadline. Background checks are carried out on the final candidate.
  
  

Great Place to Work
  
  

Health care allowance, parental pay, pension & insurance according to collective agreements
  
  

Dog zone & gym in the 3house
  
  

Great discounts on bicycles, public transport, and electric cars
  
  

Flexible holidays and five extra days off per year
  
  

Subsidized lunch
  
  

Generous bonus models or commissions
  
  

We are driven by constantly trying to improve things in new and different ways. Of course, we are at the forefront of developing future networks.
  
  

We see ourselves as a crucial part of Sweden's social structure because we know that reliable connectivity is a necessary foundation stone in today's digital world. That's why we see it as our job to keep our mobile network up and running year-round, 24/7, to ensure you can always count on being connected when you need it most.
  
  

Tre was born as a challenger and is an organization in constant motion. We strive to be at the forefront of everything we do. We are convinced that the people at Tre are decisive for our development.
  
  

No matter how you start your journey at Tre, there are endless opportunities to grow and develop with us.
  
  

WE THINK LIKE CHALLENGERS - In a constantly changing world, we stay curious and open minded. Born with a challenger mindset, we love pushing boundaries.
  
  

WE WORK LIKE CHAMPIONS - As true champions, we always do our best. We take ownership, set clear goals and stay focused. Together we´re on a winning streak.
  
  

WE ACT LIKE BUDDIES - Free to be ourselves, we treat each other with respect. Together we make a friendly bunch, born, and one tough force.
  
  

2003
  
Tre was the first in Sweden to offer video calls and mobile video streaming. At this time, seeing the person you are calling in the eyes is a completely new experience.
  
  

2006
  
Tre launches mobile broadband as the third operator in the world. Over the next five years, Tre will win awards for Sweden’s fastest mobile broadband.
  
  

2013
  
Hallon, Tre’s sister company, was created with the idea of being a simple mobile operator, free from any unnecessary fuss.
  
  

2019
  
It has been an eventful year! 3Världen was launched, allowing customers to surf in 80 countries at the same price as in Sweden. Then, 3Samla was introduced, enabling all customers to add more users to their subscription. Last but not least, Tre became the first in Sweden to launch a public 5G network.
  
  

2025
  
Tele2 Arena has been renamed 3Arena. With our strong passion for innovation, connectivity, and experiences, we will contribute to developing the arena and the area.
  
  

Viktor Pelagalli | Contact Person

title: Software developer / Typescript
description:
We’re looking for a Software Developer with strong TypeScript and Node.js skills to join our development team. You'll work with modern frameworks like NestJS, building scalable, high-performance e-commerce solutions. You'll also handle both relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases, ensuring seamless data management.


In this role, you’ll work directly with clients and internal teams to develop and implement tailored solutions that drive business growth. You’ll be key in understanding client needs, making smart technical decisions, and delivering scalable, future-proof solutions. Collaboration is central, and you’ll work closely with developers, designers, and project managers to ensure seamless integration and high technical standards.

**What You'll Do**

* Develop backend services and APIs using Node.js in TypeScript.
* Optimize data handling in databases and caching solutions.
* Collaborate with clients, designers, developers, and strategists to create world-class e-commerce solutions.
* Ensure performance, security, and scalability in everything you build.

**Who You Are**

* Experienced in TypeScript and Node.js, with a strong understanding of modern backend development.
* Comfortable working with modern frameworks such as NestJS or similar frameworks.
* Skilled in relational and NoSQL databases.
* Comfortable with cloud based hosting solutions such as AWS or Google cloud, and their serverless offerings.
* A problem-solver who thrives in a fast-moving, high-quality environment.

**Why Join Us?**

* Work with top e-commerce brands in a high-impact role.
* Be part of a collaborative, innovative team at one of Europe’s leading agencies.
* Competitive benefits, flexible work options, and continuous skill development.

Clear career growth paths, whether you want to specialize or take on leadership roles.  
* 

**About Grebban**


Grebban develops brands and designs cutting-edge e-commerce experiences for committed and ambitious clients worldwide. As one of the most sought-after agencies in Europe, we primarily collaborate with brands looking for long-term partnerships, helping them achieve outstanding results in their most vital sales channels.


Our services include brand development, growth strategies, UX and digital design, system architecture, and building state-of-the-art e-commerce solutions. As headless commerce experts, we work primarily with platforms like Centra, Norce, and Shopify Plus.


We’re proud to partner with some of the most inspiring brands, including Filippa K, J.Lindeberg, Represent, Peak Performance, Björn Borg, Djerf Avenue, Tretorn, Timex, Osprey London, Hestra, NN07, Sandqvist and many, many more

 **Interested?**


We’re always looking for driven professionals to join our team. If you're passionate about e-commerce and development, send us your application—let’s talk!

title: Backend Developer to Disruptive Novotech
description:
### **About the Company**


Disruptive Novotech is at the forefront of innovation in wearable neuromodulation medical devices. As a dynamic and fast-growing start-up, the company is passionate about improving healthcare through cutting-edge technology. Join the team and help redefine the future of electro-stimulation.

### **About the Position**


We are looking for a Backend Developer who enjoys developing robust systems and working with high security and performance requirements.

**Your key responsibilities:**

* Contribute to the backend architecture and take part in the development from day one.
* Develop and optimize backend systems for high security and performance.
* Manage user authentication, data storage, and integrations.
* Collaborate with frontend developers and other technical teams.
* Ensure system security and compliance with regulatory requirements.
* Contribute to documentation efforts, including modeling with SysML and UML.

### **Qualifications and Characteristics**


The ideal candidate is a skilled Backend Developer who thrives in building secure, high-performance systems from the ground up. You will contribute to the backend architecture, ensuring robust authentication, data management, and seamless integrations while meeting strict security and regulatory standards.

**We are looking for someone who:**

* Has a university degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Has backend development experience, preferably in Go, C, or C++.
* Has experience with databases and cloud solutions (GCP is a plus).
* Has knowledge of system security and IT security.
* Has experience working with ISO/medical technology regulations or is interested in learning.
* Has experience with modeling using SysML and UML.
* Is analytical, solution-oriented, and passionate about building stable and efficient systems.
* Sees opportunities for growth and is motivated by the possibility of taking on greater responsibilities as the project progresses.

### **Additional Information**


We apply an ongoing selection process so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible!


If you have any questions don’t hesitate to reach out to jimmy@astaagency.se

title: Frontend Developer to Disruptive Novotech
description:
### **About the Company**


Disruptive Novotech is at the forefront of innovation in wearable neuromodulation medical devices. As a dynamic and fast-growing start-up, the company is passionate about improving healthcare through cutting-edge technology. Join the team and help redefine the future of electro-stimulation.

### **About the Position**


Are you a Frontend Developer passionate about building beautiful, fast, and user-friendly applications? We are looking for someone to take ownership of our frontend and be involved from the start in developing a premium product.


Your key responsibilities:

* Develop and optimize mobile applications for both iOS and Android.
* Build a scalable and efficient frontend system that delivers a premium experience.
* Work closely with UI designers and backend developers.
* Ensure the applications load quickly, are bug-free, and provide a top-tier user experience.
* Contribute to decisions on frameworks and technical solutions.

### **Qualifications and Characteristics**


The ideal candidate has experience developing frontend solutions for mobile and web apps, with a strong focus on systematization and performance. You are skilled in cross-platform development for Android and Apple, understand animations and complex performance optimizations, and take pride in delivering high-quality, efficient, and well-structured applications.

**We are looking for someone who:**

* Has at least 5 years of frontend development experience, preferably focused on mobile apps.
* Has a university degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
* Has experience developing apps for both iOS and Android.
* Has a strong quality mindset and experience working with high UI/UX standards.
* Has experience with animations, caching, and performance optimization.
* Has experience with Bluetooth communication, preferably Bluetooth to an embedded product.
* Good to have experience with developing web-based applications.
* Thrives in a team environment and enjoys working with attention to detail.
* Meritorious to be familiar with software development according to regulatory frameworks for medical devices, for example, IEC 62304.

### **Additional Information**


We apply an ongoing selection process so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible!


If you have any questions don’t hesitate to reach out at jimmy@astaagency.se

title: Next Generation: Radio Design Developer
description:
**Our Exciting Opportunity**
----------------------------

  



Join Ericsson, a leader in the technology and telecommunications industry, as an RF Designer working with development of Ericsson’s Radio Units. Contribute to cutting-edge projects and help us shape the future of wireless communication.

  

We are actively seeking the next wave of tech talent through our NextGen graduate initiative in Stockholm. This opportunity is for recent graduates with 0-3 years of experience who are eager to launch a meaningful career in technology. Although we have an exceptional team in place, we are always focused on building for the future. If you're ready to make an impact, this is your chance to join us.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

  

* Participate in early phases of design and feasibility studies.
* Make uplink and downlink RF analogue systemizations.
* Make electrical schematics and participate in PCB layout design
* Perform EM layout simulations.
* Evaluate and qualify new components.
* Work with verification of integrated circuits by creating effective test scripts
* Integrate and configure Radio products during the design phase.
* Conduct comprehensive Radio performance tests to ensure product quality.

**Join our Team**
-----------------

 **Required Qualifications:**

* Master’s degree in Electronic engineering, Wireless Communication, or related field.
* Knowledge in radio frequency design.

**Preferred Experience:**

* Hands-on experience in RF radio labs and with relevant instruments.
* Experience in EM layout simulations.
* Understanding of signal processing.
* Programming and scripting skills.


Join us at Ericsson and be a part of an innovative team contributing to world-class solutions in wireless communication. Apply now and help us build the networks of tomorrow!
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: Senior backendutvecklare - Java
description:
Vill du vara en del av ett företag där din tekniska expertis gör en verklig skillnad? Som senior Java-utvecklare får du möjligheten att vara med i utvecklingen av robusta och skalbara system som driver affärskritiska applikationer. Du kommer att arbeta med Java SE/EE, Spring Framework/Spring Boot, molnlösningar (AWS, GCP, Azure), API-design, microservices och containerbaserade arkitekturer (Docker, Kubernetes).


**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?**

* Teknisk expertis: Ungefär 5 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling, molnbaserade system och erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code.
* Kommunikationsförmåga: Du kan effektivt kommunicera komplexa tekniska lösningar till olika intressenter.
* Problemlösare: Du har en analytisk förmåga och kan tänka strategiskt för att hitta de bästa lösningarna.
* Ledarskap: Du är en informell ledare som inspirerar och stöttar dina kollegor.
* Teamspelare: Du trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* Språk: Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.

**Arbetsplats**  

Arbetsplatsen för den här rollen är Malmö med omnejd.


**Om Devoteam**  

Hos oss värderar vi medarbetarnas trivsel och utveckling högt. Vi har byggt en arbetskultur där människor känner sig inspirerade, utmanade och trygga. Vi tror att när du trivs och växer, så gör även våra lösningar det.


Vi är ett ledande IT-konsultföretag med en stark förankring i Malmös tech-community, både som Devoteam och f.d .Jayway. Vi är engagerade i att skapa långsiktiga relationer med både kunder och medarbetare. Vi drivs av en passion för teknik och innovation, och erbjuder skräddarsydda lösningar för företag inom en rad olika branscher. Bland våra initiativ kan nämnas Øredev , en av Skandinaviens största utvecklarkonferenser, som vi var med och grundade.


**Förmåner och praktisk information:**

* Kontinuerligt lärande: Vi stöder kontinuerligt lärande med kompetensgrupper varannan vecka, deltagande på Øredev och löpande kompetensdagar för din professionella utveckling. Du har möjlighet att ta certifikat med någon av våra partners (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Ledighet och pension: Vi erbjuder 30 dagars semester, kompletterande föräldraledighetsersättning och tjänstepension enligt ITP1.
* Hälsa och välbefinnande: Självklara förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, tillgång till företagshälsovård, hälsokontroller och lunchyoga på kontoret.
* Verktyg och utrustning: Du väljer själv de verktyg du behöver för att leverera och trivas i din arbetsmiljö.

**Ansökan**  

För att ansöka, vänligen skicka din ansökan via länken nedan. Vi uppmuntrar tidiga ansökningar eftersom vi granskar dem löpande.


För eventuella frågor, kontakta Sanna Ekelöf, vår rekryterare, på sanna.ekelof@devoteam.com. Sanna kommer att vara din primära kontaktperson under hela rekryteringsprocessen.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Backendutvecklare och Azure-specialist
description:
Vi söker en senior utvecklare/ arkitekt med bred erfarenhet av Azure och mjukvarulösningar med förmågan att se helheten. Du förväntas även ha lång erfarenhet som utvecklare och en öppenhet för att skriva, granska och felsöka kod i rollen som Azure-specialist.
  

Som Azure-specialist på Devoteam kommer du vara ledande i att ta fram den för kunden mest lämpade lösningen. Du behöver ha förmågan att diskutera, förklara samt motivera dina arkitekturella val. Vi ser dig också som aktiv i vårt partnersamarbete där du gärna tidigt utforskar nya erbjudanden inom din plattform, och leder utvecklingen för molninnovation inom Creative Tech. Certifieringar inom Azure är viktigt och meriterande men inte ett krav.


**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?**

* Har minst 6 års erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling.
* Arbetat ett par år i en liknande roll och vet vilka verktyg och metoder som är lämpliga.
* Har erfarenhet av att orientera dig i komplexa miljöer och organisationer.
* Trivs med att omsätta verksamhetskrav till design av säkra, skalbara samt kostnadseffektiva lösningar.
* Har erfarenhet av att designa och bygga API:er.
* Har erfarenhet att jobba med säkerhet, tex genom hotmodellering.
* Kan föra kunddiskussioner både på svenska och engelska.
* Stark vilja att leverera utmärkt service, med fokus på kundens behov och framgång.
* Har en genuin förståelse för det agila tillvägagångssättet och en vilja och ett fokus att snabbt kunna leverera värde.
* God förståelse för DevOps-principer och förmåga att integrera dem i arkitekturella beslut.

**Arbetsplats**  

Arbetsplatsen för den här rollen är Malmö med omnejd.


**Om Devoteam**  

Hos oss värderar vi medarbetarnas trivsel och utveckling högt. Vi har byggt en arbetskultur där människor känner sig inspirerade, utmanade och trygga. Vi tror att när du trivs och växer, så gör även våra lösningar det.


Vi är ett ledande IT-konsultföretag med en stark förankring i Malmös tech-community, både som Devoteam och f.d .Jayway. Vi är engagerade i att skapa långsiktiga relationer med både kunder och medarbetare. Vi drivs av en passion för teknik och innovation, och erbjuder skräddarsydda lösningar för företag inom en rad olika branscher. Bland våra initiativ kan nämnas Øredev , en av Skandinaviens största utvecklarkonferenser, som vi var med och grundade.


**Förmåner och praktisk information:**

* Kontinuerligt lärande: Vi stöder kontinuerligt lärande med kompetensgrupper varannan vecka, deltagande på Øredev och löpande kompetensdagar för din professionella utveckling. Du har möjlighet att ta certifikat med någon av våra partners (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Ledighet och pension: Vi erbjuder 30 dagars semester, kompletterande föräldraledighetsersättning och tjänstepension enligt ITP1.
* Hälsa och välbefinnande: Självklara förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, tillgång till företagshälsovård, hälsokontroller och lunchyoga på kontoret.
* Verktyg och utrustning: Du väljer själv de verktyg du behöver för att leverera och trivas i din arbetsmiljö.

**Ansökan**  

För att ansöka, vänligen skicka din ansökan via länken nedan. Vi uppmuntrar tidiga ansökningar eftersom vi granskar dem löpande.

title: Fullstack developer - Golang & Javascript
description:
**What is the role?**
---------------------


You will be part of the team that plans new features and develops the majority of Mecenats products. You will also take a big part in planning, taking responsibility for the whole cycle from idea to production, and be a part of building a world-class team.

**What skills do you need?**
----------------------------


Mecenats products are mostly built with **Golang** and **Vue.js**. Other key components in our current setup are **Dynamodb**, **Solr**, **Docker**. We’re looking for a developer with a couple years ofprofessional experience working in a production environment. **Experience with backend systems is required**. Previous relevant experience with our technologies is great, but we value the ability to learn new things over experience.

### **Frameworks and Services**

* Golang and Vue.js
* Tailwind CSS, Javascript/Typescript
* Dynamodb, Solr, Docker
* Git, AWS

### **Tools**

* Slack, Notion, Trello
* Figma
* Any laptop of your choice
* The editor of your choice

**Qualities we look for**
-------------------------

* **Passionate**. We love what we do, you should too.
* You like to have the **responsibility** and make sure things get forward.
* Eager to **learn** new things. At Mecenat we love new tech that keeps us moving forward in a modern way.


This is a hybrid remote role. We work Mondays and Thursdays from our office in Lindholmen, Gothenburg, the rest of the week is optional.


Interested? Apply today! Or if you know someone that you think would like this opportunity let us know.

title: Java Developer
description:
**Company Description**
 We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!
   

  

 We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.
   

  

 With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences, and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.
   

  

 We are looking for you who want to grow with us!
   

  

 With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Daily Tasks**
* Develop, test, and maintain high-quality software solutions following best programming and architecture standards.
* Lead and participate in code reviews to ensure high code quality and alignment with business needs.
* Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve software issues by applying programming best practices.
* Champion continuous improvement initiatives within the engineering team.
* Implement and enforce security best practices through threat modelling and build pipelines to ensure secure software delivery.
* Handle incident response efforts, coordinate with teams, and perform root cause analysis for complex issues.
* Collaborate cross-functionally to enhance and improve operational processes.
* Contribute technical expertise to business initiatives, helping shape organisational objectives.


 Qualifications
   

  

**Technical Skills**
* Solid experience in Java 11+ and Spring Boot for backend development.
* Proficiency in cloud platforms, preferably Azure.
* Strong understanding of databases, with preference for Cosmos DB.
* Familiarity with React.js, with the ability to handle UI tasks independently when needed.
* Hands-on experience with BigQuery for data processing.
* Experience in setting up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub.
* Proficiency in containerisation technologies,such as Docker.


 Additional Information
   

  

**Start:** 
 Immediately
   

  

**Working hours:** 
 100%
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months of probationary employment

title: Backend Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 As a Backend Software Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Strong professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Mobile SDK development experience


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Game developer
description:
We are now looking for the best game developer to join us! You have the chance to be a part of creating the best casino games in the online slot industry!
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and maintain Casino Games for both desktop and mobile browsers
* The technologies you primarily will work with are HTML5, WebGL, Typescript, Pixi, GSAP and Javascript.
* In a team environment that consists of product management, graphic artistry, sound creation, server development and game mechanics, you will contribute to deliver the best casino games in the market today.
* Your main responsibilities are to make the game graphics come alive with spectacular animations, game flow, game mechanics and sounds according to a result delivered by our game servers.


 Who you are
   

  

* You are a Master Google Searcher that have Stackoverflow as your absolute favourite web site.
* You have practical experience of working with OOP in some language and you have a pragmatic approach to software development.
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in.
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you.
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and take ownership of changes from editor to production system.


 Beneficial skills
   

  

* Working experience of mobile browsers and knowledge about their limitations and how they work in different ways is a big plus.


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are looking for an experienced backend developer who is passionate about microservice principles and wants to be part of a truly digital organization. In this role, you will have the opportunity to develop and maintain a modern microservice infrastructure, creating customized solutions and integrations that support the business.
   

  

 You will work closely with domain experts to understand their needs and build solutions that optimize their workflows. The role also includes responsibility for developing and maintaining DevSecOps processes and governance principles.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and operate backend services that are critical to the organization's success.
* Ensure that services are fast, scalable, and reliable.
* Build and maintain infrastructure, tools, and deployment pipelines.
* Take ownership of the digital capabilities that your team manages.
* Continuously improve products through innovation and collaboration with other development and product teams.


**Requirements**
* A degree in computer science, data science, or equivalent practical experience.
* 3–7 years of experience in building and maintaining backend services using Java, Kotlin, or similar languages.
* Knowledge of best practices in software development, such as Continuous Delivery and automated testing.
* Experience or interest in working with Kubernetes, Terraform, and event-driven architecture.
* Need Swedish speaking and writing


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathianantu@vipas.se &contact me at +46760294155
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Senior Frontend Developer till Nordens ledande investment bank!
company_industry: Financial Services, Investment Banking, and Banking
description:
**Om Carnegie** 




 Carnegie är en av Nordens främsta finansiella rådgivare och förvaltare. Våra olika verksamheter tillhör, var för sig, marknadsledarna inom sitt respektive område Du hittar mer information på: www.carnegie.se
 



  





**Vad är Carnegie Tech?** 




 Carnegie Tech levererar moderna IT-lösningar och professionella tjänster för Carnegies kärnverksamhet, vilket involverar i hela kedjan från idé till färdig produkt. På Carnegie Tech i Stockholm arbetar ca 70 personer, arbetssättet är agilt i en organisation som genomsyras av en öppen, kreativ och affärsdriven arbetsmiljö.
 



  





 Vårt fina kontor är beläget mitt i centrala Stockholm och på Carnegie Tech har du möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån.
 



  





**Om Rollen** 




 I rollen som Senior Frontend Utvecklare kommer du att arbeta med Carnegies externa kundgränssnitt. Tillsammans med affären skapar du grymma applikationerna för våra slutkunder. Du får möjlighet att jobba med vår externa webbplattform och mobilapplikation, där fokus ligger på att skapa så mycket värde som möjligt för vårt kundsegment och att utveckla applikationer som ger en exklusiv känsla för våra kunder.
 



  





 Här blir du en del av ett tight team där du är med i hela kedjan från idé, design, utveckling till release. Teamet består av mycket kompetenta medarbetare som tillsammans strävar efter att leverera de bästa IT-lösningarna och produkterna för att möta företagets och våra kunders behov.
 



  





 Vi arbetar i en modern plattform, nära affären och med den senaste tekniken. Ditt fokus ligger på att programmera och producera högkvalitativ kod, särskilt inom JavaScript och React. Tillsammans med dina kollegor löser ni komplexa problem, tar viktiga beslut och säkerställer att ni har rätt förutsättningar för att kunna utföra ett högkvalitativt arbete.
 



  





**Din profil** 




 Med ett stort intresse för tekniska lösningar och en vilja att ständigt hålla dig uppdaterad inom den senaste tekniken, har du även ett intresse för finans och kanske erfarenhet från branschen. Du trivs i en föränderlig miljö och din kommunikativa förmåga gör det möjligt att effektivt samverka med olika intressenter. Vidare är du/har du:
 



  




* Lång erfarenhet inom frontend utveckling (främst inom JavaScript och React)
* Positiv, affärsorienterad, prestigelös och lösningsorienterad
* Intresse för att bygga bra användargränssnitt och design
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Git
* Flytande kunskaper både svenska och engelska
* Tidigare erfarenhet av eller ett intresse för finansbranschen
* Relevant akademisk utbildning alternativt ett långt brinnande intresse som skapat erfarenhet



  





**Meriterande kunskaper** 



* Erfarenheter av komponentbibliotek
* Kunskaper och erfarenhet av DevOps och effektiva arbetsflöden
* Kunskaper i C#, .NET
* Kunskaper inom UX/UI
* Erfarenhet av molnlösningar, särskilt inom Azure



  





 För att lyckas i rollen behöver du trivas i en föränderlig miljö där du har möjlighet att ha en stor påverkan.
 



  





**Vårt erbjudande** 




 Vi erbjuder en mångsidig roll i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö i en platt organisation med korta beslutsvägar. Hos Carnegie har du möjlighet att genom egna insatser påverka resultat och din individuella utveckling. Du får ett omväxlande arbete med utrymme för egna initiativ och stort ansvarstagande med frihet under ansvar. Vidare erbjuder vi:
 



  




* Flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet till distansarbete
* Friskvårdsbidrag och förmånliga rabatter
* Konkurrenskraftig tjänstepension och Föräldrabidrag
* Hälso- & Privatvårdsförsäkring med hälsokontroll
* Möjlighet till rörlig ersättning
* En mängd roliga sociala aktiviteter och föreningar
* Carnegie personal development: en mängd olika utbildningar/kurser som erbjuds



  





 För att säkerställa en hög kvalitet och objektivitet i vår rekryteringsprocess, använder vi oss av tester och slutkandidat omfattas även av en bakgrundskontroll. Denna rekrytering sker med löpande urval, varför vi gärna ser att du skickar din ansökan snarast, dock senast den 31 mars 2025.
 



  





 Om du har några frågor är du välkommen att kontakta Jill Holmgren, jilhol@carnegie.se, Senior Talent Acquisition Partner.
 



  





 (Kontakt fr konsultbolag/rekryteringsbolag/rekryterare undanbedes)
 



  





*Carnegie värnar om mångfald och att ta tillvara människors olika erfarenheter, kunskaper och egenskaper. Utifrån dessa kan vi skapa en kreativ och utvecklande arbetsmiljö som ökar förutsättningarna att uppnå ett optimalt resultat.* 




  





**Välkommen med din ansökan!**

title: Software Engineer
description:
Welcome to SSC – Swedish Space Corporation, the perfect workplace for those passionate about technology in general and space in particular.
   

  

 With space organizations, research institutes, institutional and commercial actors as customers, we offer specialist expertise in satellite communications, space consulting
   

  

 services, rocket and balloon systems, flight test services, satellite propulsion systems, and much more.
   

  

 At SSC, we provide our customers access to Space. With over 700 employees around the world, we provide expert-level competence in customer support including the design,
   

  

 test, launch, in-orbit and routine operations of flight and space systems. To achieve this, SSC uses our global network of ground systems and multi-mission antennas to provide
   

  

 satellite management, data downlink, antenna hosting and launch support to some of the largest names in the space industry including NASA, ESA, JAXA and many other New
   

  

 Space customers as well.
   

  

**Are you fueled by a passion for people and the ambition to create an awesome workplace?
   

  

 Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey with us to help Earth benefit from space?** 
  

  

 If you answer yes to these questions, we invite you to seize the opportunity to make a significant impact as a Software Engineer in our team. We are looking for a dedicated team memberwho shares our core values of Customer passion, Care, Collaboration, Curiosity, and Courage.
   

  

**YOUR ROLE**
 We offer the opportunity to join the Software unit within SSC Connect, which is entrusted to develop and maintain critical systems required to connect our customers with their satellites.
   

  

 This is a rare and exciting opportunity to join a team that is building a new Monitoring & Control system. With a new system comes challenges beyond the code. Together with your colleagues, you will set the standard for how we build new systems, but also for how we handle a production environment in the cloud, how we enable efficient operations by enhanced observability and most importantly how we create a great user experience for our customers. What this team builds up, many other teams will use.
   

  

 It is important for us to have a good balance of experience in all teams, so currently we are looking for both a senior software engineer and a software engineer that is earlier in their development.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We think that you care – about your systems, your colleagues and your users. That you have a creative and analytical mindset. You take responsibility, drive your own initiatives and can learn and process technical details quickly. We also think that you appreciate both working autonomously and together with other people.
   

  

 You have a European citizenship and can travel within and outside Sweden if needed. As this position is critical to the operations of the SSC Services, it may include outside of standard working hours working and/or being part of an on-call team with up to 1 week on-call per month.
   

  

**What You Need To Know**
* B.S. Computer Science or Computer/Software Engineering, or similar experience
* 2+ years of software development experience (considerably longer if you aspire on the senior software engineer position)
* Experience with Golang and Python or similar languages
* Comfortable working in Linux
* Fluency in English


**EXTRA MERITS**
* Familiar with AWS
* Experience with message bus technologies like NATS/Kafka
* Experience of API development using RESTFul(JSON/XML)
* Experience of DevOps and CI/CD Methodologies
* Experience from the space industry


**WE OFFER YOU**
* An opportunity to be part of the exciting space industry and help Earth benefit from Space.
* An excellent opportunity for personal development and challenging endeavors.
* To be part of international development projects with highly engaged teams.
* A workplace characterized by an open atmosphere and proud employees all over the world.
* Possibility to work remotely part of the time (max 50%), and flexible work hours.


**LOCATION**
 This is permanent position with 40 hours/week, located at our office in Solna or Kiruna.
   

  

**NEXT STEP**
 If this opportunity sparks your interest, don’t wait—apply today! Applications are reviewed on an ongoing basis, and interviews will be conducted continuously. We kindly ask you to submit your CV when applying. While you are welcome to include a brief personal note or letter, our evaluation will primarily focus on your skills and qualifications as outlined in your CV, ensuring a fair and unbiased recruitment process.
   

  

 Please note that the job advertisement may close earlier than the stated deadline if we receive a high volume of applications. This allows us to ensure a fair and efficient recruitment process and give each application the attention it deserves.
   

  

 This is a security-classified position and will require a background check prior to employment.
   

  

**WE HELP EARTH BENEFIT FROM SPACE**
 Swedish Space Corporation (SSC) is a leading global provider of advanced space services, with more than 50 years of experience. We help space organizations, research institutes, commercial and institutional actors from all over the world to get access to space.
   

  

 With local presence on all continents and about 700 committed employees, we offer specialist expertise in satellite communications and satellite control services, spacecraft operations, rocket and balloon systems, launch services and flight test services, as well as engineering, operations and consultancy services for space missions.
   

  

 We help Earth benefit from Space.

title: Java Developer
description:
**About Kambi**
 Kambi Group plc is a leading B2B provider of premium sports betting services to licensed gaming operators. Our services provide an end-to-end solution for operators wanting to launch a standalone Sportsbook or bolster their existing offering with an innovative sports betting product. From front-end user interface to customer intelligence, risk management and odds compiling, all built on our in-house developed software, we strive to deliver the ultimate service and solution to our partners.
   

  

 Our vision is to create the world’s leading sports betting experiences, together with our partners.
   

  

 With offices in Malta (HQ), Philadelphia, London, Bucharest, Manila, Sydney, Uppsala and Stockholm we are +950 passionate and highly skilled people working at Kambi. We believe in a diverse and flexible environment. Our core values are: Better, Faster, Together. These core values are reflected throughout our whole organization as well as towards our partners. We strive to have a diverse work environment as we believe it makes us a strong organization.
   

  

**The Role:**
 We are looking for Java Developers with all levels of experience to further strengthen our development teams' ability to turn user stories into shippable code. To succeed in the role, we believe that you have previous experience with building scalable and maintainable applications that run and fail gracefully. You should have both theoretical and practical knowledge of agile and/or lean software development.
   

  

 Kambi are strong believers of self-organized teams, and you will be part of a cross-functional, self-organizing & self-managing team. Together with the team you will participate in team discussions, grooming's, retrospectives with the goal of improving our product and processes. You will take part in discussions with our Product Owners to give technical insight, as well as trouble-shoot and solve production incidents in a complex environment.
   

  

 Some of the tools and frameworks we use in the backend teams:
   

  

 J ava / Kotlin, Spring framework, REST/Json, Linux, AWS, Helm, Kubernetes, Apache Kafka, Git
   

  

 We operate in DevOps teams, meaning you'll have the opportunity to take full ownership of all aspects of our products and components, from idea to deployment/support.
   

  

 At Kambi we believe in the importance of work-life-balance and making that culture part of our day-to-day. We believe that you as well as Kambi benefit from having happy, healthy colleagues.
   

  

 You will join one of our Stockholm-based development teams with a hybrid work setup.
   

  

 To fit well in our teams, you should have a curious mindset, be triggered by challenges and love to be part of a team. You are passionate about development and always eager to learn new things. As we are an international and multinational company, our main language is English.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
 An opportunity to work in a successful and fast-growing, international company. We operate in AWS cloud and we can offer an exciting environment where you can grow and learn.
   

  

 You will join a dedicated team where you will be able to directly influence the work environment and processes. We also believe in an encouraging environment, and we embrace diversity.
   

  

 At Kambi, we encourage learning and provide opportunities for our team members to develop their skills and knowledge. We offer internal trainings, participation in industry conferences, organize hackathons and other collaborative events. We believe that the best way to achieve our mission is to foster a culture of continuous learning and development.
   

  

 We are curious about your story, if you are interested in meeting us please apply with your CV.
   

  

 #wearekambi
   

  

**Kambi's ongoing commitment to Diversity and Inclusion in the workplace**
 If you require any reasonable adjustment during the recruitment process, please notify your recruiter, who will assist you however they can. Diversity and inclusion is at the heart of who we are and who we aim to be. While we are proud of the positive and inclusive company culture we have created, we know we can do so much more. Kambi constantly evolves its Diversity and Inclusion strategy to ensure it becomes an even more inclusive and positive place to work, with the core management team reaffirming its commitment to delivering on employee feedback.
   

  

**Creating an inclusive environment**
 We believe Kambi's greatest strength is the collective talent of our employees. Kambi is committed to ensuring we create an inclusive work environment where everyone can feel valued, thrive and achieve their potential, regardless of who they are or what their background is. We know that it is only by having a balance of different voices, values and opinions that Kambi is able to be the market leader it is today.
   

  

 #wearekambi

title: Back End Developer

description:
**About the Company** 




 Disruptive Novotech is at the forefront of innovation in wearable neuromodulation medical devices. As a dynamic and fast-growing start-up, the company is passionate about improving healthcare through cutting-edge technology. Join the team and help redefine the future of electro-stimulation.
 



  





**About the Position** 




 We are looking for a Backend Developer who enjoys developing robust systems and working with high security and performance requirements.
 



  





**Your key responsibilities:** 



* Contribute to the backend architecture and take part in the development from day one.
* Develop and optimize backend systems for high security and performance.
* Manage user authentication, data storage, and integrations.
* Collaborate with frontend developers and other technical teams.
* Ensure system security and compliance with regulatory requirements.
* Contribute to documentation efforts, including modeling with SysML and UML.

 The ideal candidate is a skilled Backend Developer who thrives in building secure, high-performance systems from the ground up. You will contribute to the backend architecture, ensuring robust authentication, data management, and seamless integrations while meeting strict security and regulatory standards.
 



  





**We are looking for someone who:**

 We apply an ongoing selection process so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible!
 



  





 If you have any questions don’t hesitate to reach out to jimmy@astaagency.se

description:

 For our client, a SaaS company from Stockholm, we are currently looking for a Senior-/Lead Engineer who can lead technically and be a role model to other Engineers.
 



  





 Do you love building well tested and stable applications?
 



 Do you believe that “teamwork makes the dream work”?
 



 As a Developer you can lead the charge and are no stranger to helping others around you?
 



  





 Then this opportunity might be for you!

 You will be working tightly with both frontend and backend developers on the API and core functionalities, as well as building out the backbone of the platform, which is written in Ruby on Rails. You will challenge the current architecture, deploy improvements it and to the overall processes and systems. You will help coach the development team on best practices and help them grow along with the company.  Design, develop, and implement improvements that will be the foundation of the platform for years to come.

 Guide and coach fellow developers, sharing your expertise to elevate the entire team’s skills and best practices.

 Your contributions will have a lasting impact on the platform’s success, helping them to deliver world-class solutions to their clients.

title: Junior backend developer to Euro Accident!
description:
*Are you a dedicated junior backend developer ready to develop and deliver software applications to support the business needs? Do you want to work in an environment where care, initiative, and innovation shape your everyday? If so, our role may interest you. Learn more about what we offer below.*
 Insurance and health make a winning combination! Through early interventions, collaboration with competent partners, and smart digital services, Euro Accident has made things happen. With our offering, insurance has evolved from mere financial compensation to contributing to quality of life and Sustainable Employees. Today, almost half a million people have security through us. We take pride in our satisfied customers, our good reputation, and the contribution we make to society. Now we're advancing to help even more and are looking for someone who wants to be part of our continued success story.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a junior backend developer, you'll be responsible for:
   

  

* Design, develop, and implement scalable and reliable C# backend APIs using .NET, focusing on performance, security, and maintainability.
* Participate in code reviews, troubleshooting, and debugging to ensure the delivery of high-quality software.
* Stay updated on the latest technologies and industry trends to continuously improve our development processes and solutions.


 At the IT-department we are a diverse team of 60 IT colleagues, spread across offices in Stockholm, Växjö, and Belgrade, offering valuable international exposure. Our primary language of communication in the IT-department is English.
   

  

 As a junior backend developer you will be working in a collaborative and innovative environment, alongside a team of passionate developers who love to solve challenges and share knowledge. We believe in agile processes and continuous improvement. You will work closely with the development team, architect and software development manager. The current development team consists of 8 developers based in Stockholm. For us, achieving good results together is as important as having fun at work!
   

  

 You will be working in a collaborative and innovative environment, alongside a team of passionate developers who love to solve challenges and share knowledge. We believe in agile processes and continuous improvement.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You identify with our values of care, initiative, and innovation and eagerly look forward to learning more about our operations and how you can contribute to ensuring that our customers can live sustainably and healthily. You thrive in a dynamic environment where change is a key driver for developing our business.
   

  

 To thrive in this role, we believe you have:
   

  

* Minimum 2 years of experience in backend development.
* Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework.
* Experience in C#.
* Experience with Web API.
* Experience in SQL, SQL Server.
* Experience with Entity Framework or similar.


 It´s a plus if you have experience working with Azure DevOps or a university degree, or equivalent, in computer science.
   

  

 We are looking for you who have the ability to manage complex information and solve problems independently. Communication is one of your strengths – you can convey messages clearly and effectively, both verbally and in writing. You thrive in a collaborative environment and recognize the value of teamwork. You are also eager to learn and grow. You are open to feedback and continuously seek new knowledge and insights to improve in your role.
   

  

 At Euro Accident, it's us employees who build success. Therefore, personal qualities and abilities are important when we recruit new employees.
   

  

**At this time, we can only consider applicants who are already located in Sweden and meet one of the following criteria:**
* Hold Swedish citizenship.
* Hold EU/EEA citizenship and are currently living in Sweden.
* Have a valid Swedish work permit.


**We offer you**
 When we contribute to a secure and healthy world, we start in our own offices. We want you to have and choose a healthy balance between work and personal life, and we value job satisfaction and our unique culture, where care, initiative and innovation are our guiding principles in everyday life.
   

  

 We offer a generous occupational pension, health and medical insurance, as well as a generous wellness grant, and the possibility of hybrid work. With our EA spirit, we keep our culture and sense of community alive through various social activities, such as shared breakfasts, after-work gatherings, and lectures on health and well-being.
   

  

 The position is a permanent full-time position, based in Stockholm Sweden. You'll be welcomed to our enjoyable office at Mörby C, Danderyd. Start date by agreement.
   

  

**Welcome with your application**
 If you have any questions about the position, you're welcome to contact the recruiter or responsible manager using the contact details below. Selection and interviews are conducted on an ongoing basis, and the position may be filled before the application deadline.
   

  

 For a fairer and more objective selection process, we use work psychological tests early in the process and ask you to answer our selection questions instead of attaching a personal letter.
   

  

 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct background checks on final candidates before making a hiring decision.
   

  

*Please note that we do not accept applications via email due to GDPR.*
**About us** 
 Euro Accident is a Swedish life insurance company with an premium income of SEK 2.4 billion and nearly 500 staff at offices in Belgrade, Gothenburg, Malmö, Stockholm, Växjö and Örnsköldsvik and branches in Copenhagen, Denmark, and Olso, Norway. We are specialists in risk, group and healthcare insurance policies, and in preventing or bringing to an end long periods of sick leave through various measures in our insurance products. Our customer base is made up of companies and organizations that take out our different insurance policies for their employees and members through insurance brokers and partners. Together we create Sustainable employees

title: Software Engineer - Frostbite Architecture Team
description:
Frostbite is EA’s proprietary game engine that comes equipped with tons of tools and technologies designed to build incredible games. Our in-house engine offers the unique ability to adapt to each game while working hand-in-hand to prioritize what to build. Our goal is to empower creators all over the world to bring their best ideas to life by creating an engine that amplifies innovation across every discipline.
   

  

 We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Frostbite Architecture Team. As a member of this team, you will develop tools that enhance the productivity and efficiency of our software engineers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* You will be part of the team evolving the architecture of the Frostbite engine.
* You will contribute directly to improving features and workflows for future EA games.
* You will create tools enabling the entire Frostbite ecosystem.
* You will collaborate with teams to achieve quality and performance goals.
* You will stay updated with industry trends and new technologies.


**Requirements**
* You have worked in a Software Engineering role.
* You have experience in C++ and C# development.
* You have worked on a game or other application.
* You have experience in software development best practices.
* You have a desire to push the boundaries of technology.
* Your motivation comes from enhancing productivity and efficiency in software development
* Experience with tools such as Git, Perforce, VisualStudio and CI/CD platforms are a benefit.


 The Frostbite Architecture Team reports to the Head of Technology within the Frostbite Leadership Team. Join our dynamic team and contribute to the success of our Frostbite technology, powering some of the world's most popular video games. Apply now and be part of shaping the future of gaming!
   

  

 , , #FlexibleWork

title: Java developer
description:
The Development Sales team is part of the Technology organization at Tre. Our main task is to develop the systems used in sales to end customers—everything from store solutions to the sales engine for our online shops.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Java developer, you are responsible for developing existing applications and support systems. We code in the latest Java version and use REST for APIs. Other tools and technologies present are Docker, Kubernetes, Git, Jenkins, Spring, and GraphQL. We have a learning and development-focused environment emphasizing knowledge sharing and continuous development. With us, you will have great opportunities to contribute knowledge and insights!
